title: Ammunition
info:
# Ammunition

Requisition yields two clips, plus one extra clip per additional degree of success.

Requisitioning a weapon's 'Standard Ammunition' has an availability of 1 level more available than the weapon.

data.name: Abyssal Bolts
data.description: A weapon using this ammunition gains the Crippling (2) and Tainted quality, but loses the Reliable and/or Sanctified qualities (if the weapon has them).

data.name: Amputator Shells
data.description: Amputator shells add 2 to the weapon's damage.

data.name: Barbed Rounds
data.description: The weapon gains the Crippling (1) Quality.

data.name: Blazer Shells
data.description: Blazer shotgun shells reduce the weapon's Range to 15 metres unless that would be greater than its actual Range. In addition, they change the weapon's Damage type to Energy (E) and give it the Flame and Primitive (7) qualities.

data.name: Bleeder Rounds
data.description: If a target takes damage from bleeder rounds, she begins to gush blood and suffers from the Blood Loss condition for 1d5 rounds or until it is successfully treated. Bleeder rounds do not affect targets with the Daemonic or Machine traits.

data.name: Dumdum Bullets
data.description: Dumdum bullets add 2 to the weapon's damage, but Armour points count double against them.

data.name: Emperor's Light Thermal Bolts
data.description: A weapon using thermal bolts loses the Primitive and Accurate qualities (if it has them), but gains +1d10 Energy damage, penetration 6, and the Melta and Inaccurate qualities. These bolts weigh twice as much as regular crossbow bolts.

data.name: Emperor's Wrath Shard Bolts
data.description: A weapon using shard bolt ammunition gains the Crippling (2) quality.

data.name: Envenomed Ammunition
data.description: The weapon gains the Toxic (2) Quality.

data.name: Executioner Shotgun Shells
data.description: The weapon loses the Scatter Quality, but adds +4 to its base Damage and +1 to its base Penetration. Ballistic Skill Tests for shots that miss at short or standard range may be re-rolled, and the defensive value of any cover for your target is ignored. When firing Executioner rounds, the weapon may not be used for Semi-Automatic or Automatic fire.

data.name: Exitus Shield-breaker Round
data.description: This ammunition ignores the Daemonic Trait, any protection from a Psychic Power, and the protection from any Field item. When this round hits a target utilising a protective Psychic Power and/or an item with the Field quality, that Psychic Power and/or Field ceases to function for 1 Round.

data.name: Exitus Hellfire Round
data.description: The weapon inflicts +1d10 damage and may inflict Righteous Fury on any damage die results of a 9 or 10. In addition, the weapon gains the Tearing Quality

data.name: Exitus Turbo-penetrator Round
data.description: The weapon inflicts +2d10 Damage and adds +5 to its Penetration. In addition, the weapon ignores any increase to a target's base Toughness Bonus from the Unnatural Toughness Trait (but does not ignore the Daemonic Trait, nor the Toughness Bonus associated with that Trait).

data.name: Expander Rounds
data.description: These rounds add 1 to a weapon's damage and penetration.

data.name: Explosive Arrows/Quarrels
data.description: Attacks using these rounds suffer a -10 penalty. These rounds change the weapon's damage type to Explosive, remove the Primitive quality, and grant the weapon the Blast (1) quality.

data.name: Hellfire Bolt Rounds
data.description: The weapon gains the Toxic (3) Quality and gains Vengeful(9) when used against living targets. When used with a Heavy Bolter, these rounds change the weapon's RoF to S/-/- and add the Blast (3) Quality. When used against a Horde, each Hit from a Hellfire Round deals 1 additional damage to the Horde's Magnitude.

data.name: Heretic's Match Incendiary Rounds
data.description: A weapon using this ammunition gains the Flame and Unreliable qualities, and loses the Blast quality (if it had it).

data.name: Hot-Shot Charge Packs
data.description: A weapon using a hot-shot charge adds 1 to its damage, gains the Tearing quality, and gains a penetration of 4. The weapon also loses its Reliable quality, and its clip size is reduced to 1.

data.name: Hyper-Density Rounds
data.description: Reduce the base range of the weapon by half. Shotguns lose the Scatter Quality and Bolt weapons change damage from X to I. Increase its Penetration by 2. The weapon gains the Tearing Quality. Finally, an average man-sized target hit by one of these rounds must succeed on an Ordinary (+10) Toughness Test or be knocked off its feet from the impact.

data.name: Inferno Shells
data.description: A weapon using inferno shells gains the Flame quality.

data.name: Man-Stopper Bullets
data.description: Man-stopper bullets add 3 to the weapon's penetration.

data.name: Metal Storm Bolt Rounds
data.description: The weapon's Damage and Penetration are both reduced by 2 but it gains the Blast (2) Quality.

data.name: Nitidus Rounds
data.description: When a psyker suffers damage from this weapon, she must make a Difficult (-10) Willpower test or be Stunned for a number of rounds equal to her degrees of failure. When a target with the Warp Instability trait suffers damage from this weapon, it must immediately test for Instability with a -10 penalty.

data.name: Psybolts
data.description: The weapon using this ammunition gains the Daemonbane and Sanctified qualities, ignores all protective benefits granted by psychic powers, and inflicts +1 damage for every point of the user's psy rating.

data.name: Psyflame
data.description: A weapon using this ammunition gains the Sanctified quality and ignores any protective benefits granted by psychic powers. Targets in its area of effect suffer a penalty to the Agility test to avoid it equal to 5 times the psyker's psy rating.

data.name: Purgatus Stakes
data.description: A weapon using Purgatus stakes gains the Sanctified quality. Further, whenever a target with either the Psyker or Daemon trait is struck by a Purgatus stake-bolt, it must make a Challenging (+0) Willpower test. If it fails, it must immediately roll on Psychic Phenomena

data.name: Purity Bolts
data.description: A weapon using purity bolts gains the Haywire (2) quality

data.name: Sanctified Ammunition
data.description: A weapon using this type of fuel or ammunition gains the Sanctified quality.

data.name: Scrambler Rounds
data.description: Scrambler rounds add the Hallucinogenic (2) and Recharge qualities to the weapon.

data.name: Silver Stakes
data.description: A weapon using silver stakes gains the Sanctified quality and inflicts an additional 1d10 damage against targets with the Daemonic or Psyker trait.

data.name: Solid Slugs
data.description: A shotgun loaded with slug rounds increases its Damage by +1 and Penetration by +2. It loses the Scatter Quality.

data.name: Stalker Bolt Rounds
data.description: Awareness Tests to hear shots made with stalker rounds suffer an additional -30 penalty and can only be attempted within 30 metres of the firer. However, reduce this weapon's Damage by 2.

data.name: Tempest Bolt Shells
data.description: Tempest bolt shells change the weapon's damage type to Energy and grant it the Shocking quality. They also add 3 to the weapon's damage against targets with the Machine trait.

data.name: Theta-Pattern Concussion Bolts
data.description: A weapon using this ammunition gains the Blast (5) and Concussive (5) qualities. Additionally, anyone within the blast radius must pass a Hard (-20) Strength test or be thrown 1d5 metres away from the centre of the blast and knocked Prone.

data.name: Theta-Pattern Shock Bolts
data.description: A weapon using shock bolts gains the Shocking quality. In addition, if the target fails its Toughness test from the Shocking effect by three or more degrees, it becomes Unconscious instead of Stunned for a number of rounds equal to her degrees of failure.

data.name: Tox Rounds
data.description: Tox rounds add the Toxic (1) quality to the weapon but reduce its damage by 2.

data.name: Tracer Rounds
data.description: When making a Full-Auto Attack, the character scores an additional number of Degrees of Success equal to one half of the initial Degrees of Success, rounding up. If a Player Character's Comrade is equipped with tracer rounds, she adds an additional +5 to Ballistic Skill Tests when using the Ranged Volley Order (for a total of +10). At Point Blank Range, tracer rounds gain the Flame Quality. At the GM's discretion, tracers may have a chance of igniting inflammable materials at longer ranges, as well.

data.name: Void Rounds
data.description: Weapons using void rounds gain the Reliable quality in void conditions.
